name: New Adventure (Knecrox)
description:
The Dark Mage, is coming... And there's only one way to defeat him. Taking a sip of The Legendary Syrup. Only one tiny problem. You will have to find the ingredience to make this Legendary Syrup in order to take a small sip. There's five specific syrups throughout the Kingdoms and Queendom. Find companians and venture through caves and mazes. get all five different syrups and combine them. Some say, once the syrups combine, there is a high chance of it blowing up. But maybe not. Either way, you'll have to find out for yourself. Goodluck and Goodbye.

Controls.

Top to bottom view:

Z=Select

X=Menu/back

C=Zoom in

V=Zoom out

Q=Turn camera left

E=Turn camera right

Arrow keys for movement

B=First Person mode

Right Click=Select

Left Click=Menu/back

Move mouse to look around or use Q and E to look left and right

C and V for the zooming in and out

B=To go back to Top to Bottom mode
